fullplot: Jeff Talley, a former LAPD hostage negotiator, has moved himself away from his failed career outside of Los Angeles, and away from his wife and daughter. When a convenience store robbery goes wrong in his turf, the three perpetrators move in on an unsuspecting family. But the family's father has a secret which might compromise his kin, and one of the criminals is about to jump over the edge. Jeff Talley has to get everybody to survive the night......if he can.
plot: A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.
title: Hostage

tomatoes.consensus: Grisly and cliched, audiences may feel they're being held Hostage.
